member.name: LSA_UNICODE_STRING
member.summary: The LSA_UNICODE_STRING structure is used by various Local Security Authority (LSA) functions to specify a Unicode string.

member.name: LSA_UNICODE_STRING.Length
member.summary: Specifies the length, in bytes, of the string pointed to by the Buffer member, not including the terminating null character, if any.

member.name: LSA_UNICODE_STRING.MaximumLength
member.summary: Specifies the total size, in bytes, of the memory allocated for Buffer. Up to MaximumLength bytes can be written into the buffer without trampling memory.

member.name: LSA_UNICODE_STRING.Buffer
member.summary: Pointer to a wide character string. Note that the strings returned by the various LSA functions might not be null-terminated.
